"Friends are like dumplings, they look plain from far away but are actually rich inside." "Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light"
Tongyi fled with his friends, Nick and Jonathan, to Chinatown when severe discrimination began. They remained in Chinatown as it was established as an Asian safe zone. They stumbled upon the Longying and joined the group. While Nick and Jonathan trained, Tongyi took on an administrative role and helped establish connections for the Longying, preferring it to a combat role.
He spent years working in restaurants across Chinatown and eventually opened his own restaurant outside of Chinatown. This restaurant was opened in Surry Hills and named the Lucky Moon.
Tongyi then proceeded to link his restaurant to the Longyingâ€™s tunnel system allowing his restaurant to act as a base of operations and exit from Chinatown. Tongyi has been very careful to remain in the good graces of authorities and takes extra precautions when helping the Longying.
He is a very close friend of Viper and looks out for his vigilante friend. Tongyi often advises and helps ground Viper though they are known to argue.
Capabilities
Owner of the Lucky Moon Restaurant
Accomplished cook
Speaks Mandarin
Qualities
Friendly
Kind-hearted
Easily upset
Reserved
Loyal

div.i: Some additional links and comments to help appreciate Tongyi Shen:

ul.li: Tongyi is most important as Nick's moral compass and line of support. He brings out the human side to Viper and asks important questions about what he's doing.
